subject: For snowflake to amplitude data ingestion, how do I backfill older updates?
description:
Hi,

While working on using https://amplitude.com/docs/data/source-catalog/snowflake we realized we need to backfill events published in the past. The current process involves nuking all the old events and republish again. However this results in counting the same events multiple times and drastically increases our events quota usage.



What is the simplest procedure to update past published events? This will be needed during development process + bug fixing on data in snowflake while reviewing in production.

subject: Web Experiment (linkage of Homepage to Sale Page)
description:
i've implemented web experiment as such: https://app.amplitude.com/experiment/hipvan/614233/config/503595/activity

our intention is to have a Home Page banner (Control), which will link to a Sale Page (Control) AND a Home Page banner (variant), which will link to a Sale Page (variant).

we've implemented pages selection as such:
Default Page View
=
URL matches regex
\/([#?].+|[#?]?$)|\/great
-singapore-sale-2025.*

however, when i'm testing Homepage Variant & clicking through, it links to a Control Impression. however, if i apply "?gss-homepage-landing-page=treatment&PREVIEW=true" on the back of the sale page URL, it will work (ie. https://www.hipvan.com/great-singapore-sale-2025?gss-homepage-landing-page=treatment&PREVIEW=true).

can you help me out please? or direct me towards an article that is helpful.

subject: Sample ratio mismatch troubleshooting
description:
Hello,

For an A/B test that we have just launched 3 days ago, I received a notification saying there is a sample ratio mismatch problem.

While looking the documentation for troubleshooting:
https://amplitude.com/docs/feature-experiment/troubleshooting/sample-ratio-mismatch

This reason looks very close to our case:
Significantly more users converted from Assignment to Exposure for one variant over another.

Indeed, the Assignments between Control and Treatment look equal, however, the conversion rate from Assignment to Exposure for Control is 0.08% and for Treatment is 0.04%.

The documentation doesn't mention how to resolve the problem.
Could you assist us in this case?

Thank you in advance

subject: Video recoridngs for experiment
description:
Is it possible to set video recoridngs for a specific experiment? 
Currently only Control has any recordings, and Variant has none. Is there anything I could have done to change this?

subject: Question on Qoutas
description:
I’d like to inquire about our monthly quota for session replays, as we’re looking to set this up.

It would be helpful to have a detailed breakdown of our current allocation across all amplitude features so we can ensure we’re using it effectively.

subject: Empty demo
description:
I am trying to follow the getting started courses, which often point to a demo with pre-existing data (https://analytics.amplitude.com/login/demo). I found two issues 
First, the link resolves to https://app.amplitude.com/login/demo which will not work in my case since I am in EU. Would be nice its fixed so it automatically redirects to https://app.eu.amplitude.com/analytics/demo/home
Second, even when I log into the EU version of the website, the demo appears empty. There is no data I can use to generate the charts explained in the courses. Am I doing something wrong? I tried inspecting the two AmpliFinancials and Amplitude Demo tabs but none had any data.

subject: Request for Invoice Due to Overcharge
description:
Last month's charge exceeded our current plan.
I would like to receive the invoice that explains this overcharge.
Is there a way to check this on the Amplitude website?

subject: Array (Data)
description:
Hello, I am reaching out because we are currently running some tests alongside the implementation work being done by the PM/dev team, based on the new tracking plan.

We want to use an array called “products” in our “view cart” event to collect key information about the products in a user's cart.

In GTM, we are correctly sending the data as an array – the tag is firing properly – with the event name “productstest” and the property name “array_productsa”.

In Amplitude, the data appears correctly in the event stream. I have followed the steps in the Amplitude documentation (adding the property to the tracking plan and changing its format from string – which is the default – to array) to try to split the data.

However, when I create a graph (segmentation) to test that everything is working as expected, I see that Amplitude is still treating the data as a string and not as an array.

How can we properly “split” this array property so that we can analyze each value individually?

I already checked Amplitude documentation, I need support to solve my issue, please not a link to any documentation.

Please see screenshots : 
- result (chart)
- expected result (from Amplitude documentation)
- details about setup

Can respond in French if possible if not english is fine.

Thanks
Tracy

subject: S3へのコホート同期が失敗する
description:
コホートデータをS3に同期しようと思ったのですが、「このコホートは、クエリ システムである Nova の内部の問題により、同期に失敗しました。現時点では過負荷になっている可能性があります。コホート クエリはコストがかかる場合があります。数分待ってから、もう一度同期してみてください。」と出て失敗します。

時間を置いて再実行したのですが、成功しませんでした。どうすればよいでしょうか。ご確認いただけますと幸いです。

subject: Issue with Guides and Surveys functionality.
description:
Guides and Surveys機能に関して確認させてください。

**▼ご質問事項▼**
Limitsを指定した状態でGuideを公開した後に、そのGuidesのTargetingを編集した場合、Limitsのカウントはリセットされるでしょうか？
（一度Guideが表示されたユーザーがいたとして、そのGuideのTargetingなどの条件を編集すると、Targetingに含まれていればまた表示されますか？）

それともTargetingが編集されても関係なく、ユーザーごとに表示カウントのようなものを保持しているのでしょうか？（つまり一度表示されたユーザーは表示されない？）

ご確認のほどよろしくお願いいたします。

subject: Request for Guides and Surveys functionality.
description:
Guides and Surveys機能に関して確認させてください。

**▼ご質問事項▼**
ある特定のページに2つのガイドが設定されている場合に、同じセッション内で連続表示されないように制御することは可能ですか？
同時に二つのガイドが表示されることはないですが、理想としては、表示タイミングを分けたいという要望です。

例：
• 1回目のセッションで「後で見る」ガイドを表示
• 次回以降のセッションで「倍速再生」ガイドを表示（※すでに「後で見る」が表示済みであることを条件に）
背景としては、連続ガイド表示で視聴を妨げ、不快に感じる可能性など、ユーザー体験への配慮があります。

現時点では、Guideのトリガー設定に「イベント追跡時」を設定して、一方のガイドを見たというイベントを契機に表示検証してみました。
時間差でのガイド表示は確認できたのですが、上記のようなアプローチが可能か？またはよりシンプルな設定はないか、教えていただけないでしょうか

• 対象org
 ◦ 組織：GLOBIS
 ◦ 組織 ID：92108
 ◦ 組織URL：hodai

------------------------------------------------
**AI Generated Summary**
The customer requested assistance with Guides and Surveys functionality for GLOBIS organization and ID92108. No new information provided.
---


> Ticket created from this message in **#camp_faq** via Thena

subject: Delete GameHouse Organization for EUROPE (NOT THE ONE IN US!!!!)
description:
READ CAREFULLY! We have two GameHouse organizations in Amplitude.

There is one that we are using and will start paying for very soon, there is one that we created a while ago, that is on the “Growth Trial Plan” and we are not paying nor will be paying for.

Both organizations are called the same, but one is in the US, the other is in Europe.

**The one we want to delete is the one in Europe!!**

- **Name: “GameHouse - DELETEME”**
- **Organization Id: 100001638**
- URL: https://app**.eu.**amplitude.com/analytics/gamehouse   ←- EUROPE!!

The one in Europe has only 1 member (myself), has only one project. I also renamed it so that the name is clear that is the one to be deleted ("GameHouse - DELETEME")

The other organization (the one in the US) should NOT be deleted. Only the one with the details and organization ID provided in this email.

The reason is simple. We created two organizations, but we are using only one. So to prevent human errors by having 2 in your system, we just want to leave 1.

Thanks!

subject: [CJON-ybtour] KPI view in Funnel : Frequency option
description:
Hi. Support team,
One of our clients, ybtour, mentioned that it is difficult to easily interpret the results provided in the **frequency option** at a glance. They requested a feature that would allow them to view segmented graph results in the Funnel chart using **Group By**, similar to how KPIs are displayed in the **Segmentation chart**.

### Request Details:

- **Funnel:** Provide a **KPI view** in the frequency option
- **Funnel:** Allow **custom buckets** in the frequency option
_(It is expected that if a custom bucket can isolate “1 time” values, it would allow a view similar to the KPI view. Dashboard > Table View.)_

Best
Chun
